document_data.name: Lost Hunting Horn of the Mavran Maidens
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Lost Hunting Horn of the Mavran Maidens''''' was a magical device that was extant by the midâ€“8{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Powers: At the very least, nothing happened when a cork rebounded from it.
document_data.History: The enigmatic device formed part of the collection that remained in [[Moonshorn Tower]] by the {{YearlinkName|761}}. Much of the collection was [[Netherese]], but many things in it were insignificant.
